Package slatepowered.reco

Class CommunicationProvider<C extends ProvidedChannel>

java.lang.Object
slatepowered.reco.AbstractChannel
slatepowered.reco.CommunicationProvider<C>
Type Parameters:
C - The channel type.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Channel, ProvidedChannel
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryCommunicationProvider
public abstract class CommunicationProvider<C extends ProvidedChannel> extends AbstractChannel
Provides communication channels. A remote is an external client or group of clients. An auxiliary channel is a publication channel which is like a more targeted global channel.

    • pubChannel

      protected C extends ProvidedChannel pubChannel
      Optional channel set by an implementation. This will be called whenever a published message is received and can not be mapped to any remotes.
